message: Let's start fair.  I take 90% and you take 10%.  It's a good deal for both of us since we're both getting something!
I think we can find a fairer split.  I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  It's a good deal for both of us!
Let's compromise. I'll take 80%, you take 20%.  That way we both get a reasonable share.  If we keep going, inflation will hurt both of us!
